column5: Navigation is a mess, the HUGE majority of training for listeners is optional and the app has limited functionality compared to browser version. The chat request function also seems buggy which is frustrating. Having said all that, there are honestly plenty of really amazing listeners available, if you persevere (all stars are for them!). There are brief self-help guides available on various topics - they can be hit and miss, and should be taken with a grain of salt, or simply as introductions.
column10: Hello Christine, Thank you for your feedback. We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We would be happy to take a look into this for you. Please contact us at Support@7cups.com. Thank you.

column5: Like everyone complains, I agree that the UI is flawed. But I think that artistically represents the kind of people that reach and use the app. Users of this app come feeling flawed and broken inside but in fact they are much more beautiful when yu see through them with the right eye. Internally they are so strong than those other apps which look beautiful on the outside but are very very destructive on the inside. (instahamgram). Peace.
column10: Hello Charan, Thank you for your feedback. We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We would be happy to take a look into this for you. Please contact us at Support@7cups.com. Thank you.

column5: So far I really like the idea of this app! I'm just hoping you can fix a bug for me, when ever I am in a chat it physically won't allow me to scroll to see my previous messages! It keeps on lagging as if I'm scrolling with water on my finger x100. I have restarted the app multiple times and cleaned my screen yet nothing seems to work except a random stroke of luck.

column5: It's ok. Seriously though, FIX THE UI. It's very hard to navigate. 1 issue that I have is that you can't view your profile (well if you can I can't find the option!). If you make a post, then people respond to it but you accidentally delete the notification, how can you view it? There must be a place where you can review all your contributions to the community like Reddit. Go to profile, then you can view all posts and comments. Where is this feature?! The whole navigation is awkward.
column10: We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We would be happy to take a look into this for you. Please contact us at Support@7cups.com. Thank you.

column5: Depends on what you are looking for. If you keep trying, you will find a good listener. Some listeners are angels who listen well. Others are perverts and trolls. The staff at 7 cups does sometimes block listeners and try their best to give good advice to them and tell them what to correct when they are given bad reviews. It is a good app given the circumstances

column5: I have been a listener on 7 cups for a little while now. I find it is an amazing platform to help others as well as share your own gift of listening. I would reccommend this to anyone to has an extra helping hand or to someone who just needs comfort in knowing others are there!

column5: Please fix the notifications. I do not get notified of the messages if i don't have the app opened all the time. Also, i think a little change in the User interface may help in snappier exchange in messages. The concept is quite imaginative and helpful but please attend to these minor issue. Thank you.

column5: The app is very weird to navigate and isnt user friendly. It also is poorly designed in general, words are too small and the colors sometimes vibrate. This makes it hard to read. Overall this app just stressed me out which is the opposite of what it should do
column10: Hello Sam, We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We would be happy to take a look into this for you. Please contact us at Support@7cups.com. Thank you.

column5: I got to this from a Psychotherapy organisation and signed up for therapy. Therapist great but the platform is terrible. It censors what I say to the therapist. We have put in numerous complaints but it doesn't get fixed. The text box for messaging therapist is so small you can't properly review what you have written, messages go missing. Notifications have ceased. The web version is better than this app, but that isn't good. Don't get the app. The concept is good and they have great work sheet type resources. The support spaces seemed helpful but the strange aliases people made it alienating for me. non-therapy messaging systems are also clumsy. Can't message another member directly. The Listeners, unqualified volunteers, are variable in quality, and members have many horror stories. I had trouble finding a useful one in my time zone. May suit some people but there are better therapy platforms.
column10: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are sorry for your experience. We are working everyday to improve the current platform. We appreciate you for providing important feedback. Your feedback has been shared with our site managers. We would like to share a list of listeners that received over 100+ positive reviews here: https://goo.gl/UtRM6b

column5: The app is trash, I'm sure the website is better but an app is more convenient. I put 5 stars because listeners there are amazing, and thanks for being free, I don't have money for professional help right now and this help a lot.

I'm sure that some of the listeners on this app are kind people who really want to help others, but it's sad that one bad apple has ruined it for the rest.

column5: The customer service, is terrible. I registered and paid for therapy. I decided to cancel it in under 30 minutes. Contacted them severally since the 17th of May I've not seen my refund. I call and drop voicemails no one responds. The last email I got was over a week ago saying that my refund will be processed in 3-5 days. I've heard from them since.

The site itself is great but the app experience is lacking. It's buggy and even tells you to install the mobile app while you're using it. Inability to delete conversations from the list permanently unless you block the person, overall the app doesn't feel fluid and intuitive. Needs work.
